pesticide.PPE: Mixers, loaders, applicators and other handlers must wear long-sleeved shirt and long pants, shoes plus socks.

Safety_Information.general_Info: Caution: Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet. Wear the appropriate Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor, or going for treatment. In case of medical emergency call 1-866-767-5042.
